VMD Plugin Programmer's Guide

Current CVS Source Tree

The Plugin Programmer's Guide describes the structure and organization of the VMD plugin system, and provides information on how to write your own plugins.

  • Introduction to VMD plugins
  • Plugin source files and directory structure
  • Compiling plugins from source code
  • Writing Tcl/Tk based plugins and extensions for VMD
  • Writing Python based plugins and extensions for VMD
  • Writing C/C++ based molecule file reader/writer plugins for VMD
  • Calling molecule file reader/writer plugins from other C/C++/Fortran software
  • Plugin-specific documentation and usage notes
  • VMD Programmer's Guide
